original: Yo cakkhudhātuṁ parijānāti so sotadhātuṁ parijānātīti? Āmantā. …pe… (Dhātuyamakaṁ paripuṇṇaṁ peyyālena.)
analyzed: yaḥ cakkhu dhātum parijānāti saḥ sota dhātum parijānāti iti āmantā pe dhātu yamakam paripuṇṇam peyyālena
translated: “One who fully understands the eye element, does he also fully understand the ear element?” … (The Pairs on Elements is finished in detail.)
The section on pairs is finished.
